attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Rip-off Britain has continued for far too long.

Privatisation of the public utilities was intended to introduce competition, reduce cost and provide better services to consumers. Neither of these ends has been achieved in the 10 years since privatisation.

Instead we are regularly hit with massive price increases, while simultaniously being told how many millions of pounds of profit has been made by the now privately owned energy firms.

These vast profits largely do not return to the British economy, and instead make individuals and in some cases foreign governments (France being an example of this) more wealthy.

We therefore call for nationalised Gas and Electricity suppliers who ALWAYS supply at the cheapest possible price. Any profits made can then be fed directly back into the country.

This will also show that the British government regards it's citizens' welfare to be more important than the need to keep the EU happy!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
